| Italian | Derived | Etymology | |---|---|---| | con | | | | il | | | | due | | | | stola | | | | in + il | | | | beato | | | | chiostro | | | | essere | | | | il | | | | due | | | | luce | | | | solo | | | | che | | | | salire | | | | e | | | | questo | | | | apportare | | | | in + il | | | | mondo | | | | vostro | | |
query.result:
| Italian | Derived | Etymology | |---|---|---| | con | Latin | cum | | il | Latin | ille | | due | Latin | duo | | stola | Greek | στολή (stolē) | | in + il | Latin | in + ille | | beato | Latin | beatus | | chiostro | Latin | claustrum | | essere | Latin | esse | | il | Latin | ille | | due | Latin | duo | | luce | Latin | lux | | solo | Latin | solus | | che | Latin | quod | | salire | Latin | salire | | e | Latin | et | | questo | Latin | ecce + iste | | apportare | Latin | apportare | | in + il | Latin | in + ille | | mondo | Latin | mundus | | vostro | Latin | vester |
Please note that the etymology of some words is uncertain or disputed.

query.prompt:
For each row in the table, look up the etymology of the word. In the "Derived" column, write Latin, Greek, Germanic, etc. In the "Etymology" column, fill in the corresponding word in Greek, Latin, or others, but leave blank if unknown.
| Italian | Derived | Etymology | |---|---|---| | ahi | | | | quanto | | | | in | | | | il | | | | mente | | | | io | | | | commuovere | | | | quando | | | | io | | | | volgere | | | | per | | | | vedere | | | | Beatrice | | | | per | | | | non | | | | potere | | | | vedere | | | | benché | | | | io | | | | essere | | |

query.prompt:
For each row in the table, look up the etymology of the word. In the "Derived" column, write Latin, Greek, Germanic, etc. In the "Etymology" column, fill in the corresponding word in Greek, Latin, or others, but leave blank if unknown.
| Italian | Derived | Etymology | |---|---|---| | presso | | | | di | | | | lei | | | | e | | | | in + il | | | | mondo | | | | felice | | |
query.result:
| Italian | Derived | Etymology | |---|---|---| | presso | Latin | *pressus*, past participle of *premere* (to press) | | di | Latin | *de* (of, from) | | lei | Latin | *illa* (she) | | e | Latin | *et* (and) | | in + il | Latin | *in* (in) + *ille* (he) | | mondo | Latin | *mundus* (world) | | felice | Latin | *felix* (happy) |
Please note that the etymology of some words may be uncertain or have multiple possible origins.
